detail_desc: Suede sandals with a decorative bow in shimmering metallic leather on the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and concealed elastication. Leather insoles and rubber soles.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide hem. Light support.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections at the back and a racer back.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections at the back and a racer back.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with low dropped, frill-trimmed shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed hem.
Satin-covered Alice band with faux fur pompoms at the top.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in an organic cotton weave with buttons at the back. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs, and a seam at the hem with a gently flared flounce.
Short jacket in cotton twill with a rounded collar, buttons down the front, front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with trumpet cuffs in broderie anglaise. Lined.
Wide-fitting jumper knitted in a mohair blend with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and dropped shoulders.
Jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and dropped shoulders.
Lined triangle bikini top in scuba fabric with ties at the back of the neck and a narrow metal fastener at the back.
Lined triangle bikini top in scuba fabric with ties at the back of the neck and a narrow metal fastener at the back.
Lined triangle bikini top in scuba fabric with ties at the back of the neck and a narrow metal fastener at the back.
Lined triangle bikini top in scuba fabric with ties at the back of the neck and a narrow metal fastener at the back.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a back pocket.

Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a back pocket.
Striped vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Striped vest top in stretch cotton jersey.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and jersey-lined drawstring hood with ribbing around the edge. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in an organic cotton weave with an embroidered motif on the chest and back. Collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative tab and button, and a rounded hem.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
5-pocket slim-fit shorts in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
5-pocket slim-fit shorts in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
5-pocket slim-fit shorts in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Straight-cut jacket in a textured weave containing glittery threads with a collar, welt front pockets, a slit at the cuffs and a single back vent. No fastenings. Lined.
Fully lined bikini top with mesh and a knot at the front. No fasteners.
Fully lined bikini top with mesh and a knot at the front. No fasteners.
Small wallet in glittery imitation leather with a zip and appliqués at the top and print motif on the front. Three inner compartments. Lined. Size 2x7.5x10 cm.
Short, straight-cut lace dress with a round neck, opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, padded shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.
Short, straight-cut lace dress with a round neck, opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, padded shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.

Fitted, long-sleeved lace dress with a V-neck at the front, seam at the waist and open section at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Lined at the front and lined skirt.

Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with shoulder pads and long sleeves. Low cut at the back, seam at the waist and a metal fastener at the back.

Slip-on mesh trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Imitation leather trainers with a hook and loop fastening at the front, padded top edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Sandals with wide, crossover straps at the front and elastic around the heel. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.

Imitation suede sandals with braiding at the top, an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, and a loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Airy chiffon blouse. Long balloon sleeves with gathers at the top, embroidery and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Lightly padded baseball jacket in woven fabric with appliqués and imitation leather sleeves in a contrasting colour. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.

Jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Diagonal front pockets, elastication at the cuffs and hem, and reflective details. Partly lined in fleece.

5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.

Short, strapless slip with a padded balconette bra in sturdy microfibre. Slip with a gentle shaping effect on the tummy, bum and thighs. Bra with underwired, moulded cups with extra-thick padding to lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the top and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Laser-cut hem with a silicone trim at the front. Shoulder straps included.

Laser-cut hem with a silicone trim at the front. Shoulder straps included.

Tunic in soft, patterned jersey with an opening and buttons at the top, gathered shoulders and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Sandals with covered platform soles and heels, straps across the foot and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform 2 cm, heel 11 cm.
